The program combines theatre courses with management and marketing courses. Participate in The Theatre School’s​ public productions, taking on various management positions, and complete multiple professional internships to gain real-world experience in the theatre management industry. You’ll also have the option to participate in New York City Intensive — a one-week independent study in New York City, where you will meet with producers, company managers, active DePaul alumni in the industry and tour theatres and museums.
